channel.title: Chris Google Holmes Gmail on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Chris Google Holmes Gmail on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: gmail
item.description: so I got a gmail account. it is pretty dope. a completely different way to use email. it is kinda crazy. I don’t like that you cannot import your old mail. and that you don’t have folders. but the tagging and such really revolutionizes email. it is pretty nuts. I want to give invites to some friends though. so I guess I am gunna have to wait. stupid google and its fancy way of doing things.
